description: This file defines a SettingsRepository class that manages app settings related to theme mode using SharedPreferences for persistent storage.

classes.name: SettingsRepository
classes.description: Provides methods to load, save, and clear theme mode settings using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: loadThemeMode
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the saved theme mode from SharedPreferences, returning a ThemeMode or null if not set.

methods.name: saveThemeMode
methods.description: Asynchronously saves the provided ThemeMode into SharedPreferences.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes the theme mode setting from SharedPreferences.
